last_episode_to_air.name: Ben & Holly's Christmas Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ben and Holly set out on a Christmas rescue mission to save the 3 trapped grown-ups from Part 1, but they all end up in Lucy's house for a Merry Christmas with Lucy and her family!

name: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
overview: The friendship between fairy princess Holly and Ben Elf in an enchanted magical kingdom of elves and fairies.

episodes.name: The Royal Fairy Picnic
episodes.overview: Holly invites Ben to the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood!

episodes.name: Gaston The Ladybird
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly like to play with Gaston the ladybird. One morning when they come to his cave the find it empty and moreover it's absolutely filthy. Thinking it will cheer up Gaston they clean up the cave. But when Gaston comes back from his morning walk they realise it was a mistake.

episodes.name: Holly's Magic Wand
episodes.overview: Holly loses her magic wand. Without it, the little fairy can't do any spells! Can Ben use his elf skills to locate the magical baton?

episodes.name: The Elf Farm
episodes.overview: Holly goes to the elf farm with Ben and Mr Elf to collect an egg for the king's breakfast. While they are there, however, a huge chicken escapes and runs amok throughout Little Kingdom!

episodes.name: Daisy and Poppy
episodes.overview: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand, escape from the castle and turn the whole kingdom into rabbits, frogs and birds.

episodes.name: Queen Thistle's Teapot
episodes.overview: Holly breaks her mother's new teapot, and Ben tries to help her repair it.

episodes.name: The Frog Prince
episodes.overview: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog, and only makes things worse as she tries to rectify her mistake.

episodes.name: The King's Busy Day
episodes.overview: King Thistle struggles to cope during a busy day, in which he has to launch a boat, judge a fruit competition and make a speech at a dance festival.

episodes.name: Fun and Games
episodes.overview: Ben uses his elf skills to win at games, so Holly teaches him a lesson.

episodes.name: King Thistle is Not Well
episodes.overview: King Thistle gets a cold, so Holly and the gang work together to collect the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

episodes.name: The Lost Egg
episodes.overview: Ben, Holly and Gaston the ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. When a tiny chick hatches, the friends must find the mummy bird.

episodes.name: The Elf Games
episodes.overview: Ben is in training for the games. Holly wants to join in but the rules state there's no flying or magic allowed.

episodes.name: Nanny Plum's Lesson
episodes.overview: Nanny Plum teaches the girls some important fairy rules. However, when she is blown away, Ben, Holly and Gaston come to her rescue.

episodes.name: The Elf Factory
episodes.overview: It's almost Christmas and the elves are busy making toys. When there is a problem with the toys, a little bit of magic is needed to save the day.

episodes.name: Mrs Witch
episodes.overview: Nanny takes Ben and Holly to visit a witch in the forest. When Nanny is rude to the witch, she gets frozen by magic.

episodes.name: Elf Joke Day
episodes.overview: Holly and Ben help the Wise Old Elf play a trick on Nanny Plum. She doesn't see the funny side, so decides to turn him into a giant snail!

episodes.name: King Thistle's New Clothes
episodes.overview: The king comes to visit. When Nanny accidentally shrinks all of the king's clothes, she magics some more from vegetables in the kitchen.

episodes.name: Elf School
episodes.overview: The Wise Old Elf tells Holly and Ben that no magic should be used at school. Holly finds it difficult to get by until Nanny uses magic to help her.

episodes.name: The Royal Golf Course
episodes.overview: A mole disturbs King Thistle's golf course, so he hires a gnome to drive it away.

episodes.name: Morning, Noon & Night
episodes.overview: The Wise Old Elf teaches the children how to tell the time, and takes Ben and Holly to see the big clock at the top of Elf Tree.

episodes.name: Gaston's Visit
episodes.overview: Gaston catches a cold, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle. Soon Gaston is taking over, eating the king's food and sleeping in his bed!

episodes.name: A Trip to the Seaside
episodes.overview: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside. Holly must use magic to rescue herself and Ben when the tide comes in and they are stuck in their castle.

episodes.name: Ben's Birthday Card
episodes.overview: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

episodes.name: Books
episodes.overview: After Queen Thistle reads the children a story about the stars, they wonder where stars go in the daytime. When they cannot find the answer in the castle's magic books, Ben and Holly pay a visit to the Wise Old Elf.

episodes.name: Betty Caterpillar
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly make a new caterpillar friend, but she is sad that she cannot fly. King Thistle says that feeding Betty will do the trick, and before long she turns from chubby caterpillar to beautiful butterfly!

episodes.name: Queen Holly
episodes.overview: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business. But ruling the Little Kingdom is not as easy as it looks...

episodes.name: Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: The duo discover that Nanny Plum is a tooth fairy by night, and head out on the job with her, but they receive a shock when they catch sight of the little girl they are visiting.

episodes.name: The Elf Windmill
episodes.overview: Mr Elf demonstrates why it takes so long to make flour, but Nanny Plum refuses to wait, and uses magic to speed up the elf windmill.

episodes.name: The Elf Band
episodes.overview: Holly and her parents try to impress Snobby King and Queen Marigold with help from the elf band.

episodes.name: The Ant Hill
episodes.overview: Things start to go missing all over the kingdom, and Ben and Holly realise that ants are stealing their possessions.

episodes.name: Redbeard The Elf Pirate
episodes.overview: Barnaby elf's uncle Redbeard has lost all his treasure, prompting Holly and Ben to follow the clues in an effort to track it down.

episodes.name: Tadpoles
episodes.overview: Holly takes frogspawn home to look after, but is shocked the following morning to discover it has turned into tadpoles.

episodes.name: Cows
episodes.overview: The children visit a big farm to find out where milk comes from.

episodes.name: Queen Thistle's Day Off
episodes.overview: Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.

episodes.name: Nature Class
episodes.overview: Nanny Plum takes the children for a lesson in the woods and uses magic to transform herself into a frog.

episodes.name: The Toy Robot
episodes.overview: The friends fix a broken toy robot, only for it to start cleaning out the castle.

episodes.name: Big Bad Barry
episodes.overview: King Thistle goes fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly, and decides they should catch the meanest fish ever - Big Bad Barry - for their supper.

episodes.name: King Thistle's Birthday
episodes.overview: Everyone is confused when the King declares no one is allowed to celebrate his birthday, because he does not want to get any older.

episodes.name: The Wand Factory
episodes.overview: Holly breaks her wand and must go to the factory at the bottom of the Great Elf Tree to get it fixed.

episodes.name: Camping Out
episodes.overview: Holly goes on a camping trip with Ben and his parents, but the annoying Mr Gnome turns up.

episodes.name: Dinner Party
episodes.overview: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves to dinner at the castle, where they sample Nanny Plum's cooking.

episodes.name: The Woodpecker
episodes.overview: King Thistle is confused when his magic bird-spotting book fails to identify a new creature that has made a nest in the castle.

episodes.name: Daisy & Poppy's Pet
episodes.overview: Nanny Plum conjures up a hamster for the twins, but the naughty new pet causes chaos in the castle.

episodes.name: The Elf Rocket
episodes.overview: King Thistle competes with the elves to build a rocket that can fly to the moon.

episodes.name: Picnic on the Moon
episodes.overview: The visitors venture out of the rockets onto the moon, but quickly realise they do not have enough fuel to return home.

episodes.name: Lucy's Picnic
episodes.overview: The elf and fairy children learn how the rubbish left after a picnic can be recycled into new toys.

episodes.name: Acorn Day
episodes.overview: A gang of squirrels appears at the Great Elf Tree determined to store acorns inside, but the Wise Old Elf has other ideas.

episodes.name: The Elf Submarine
episodes.overview: The duo set sail to retrieve Redbeard the pirate's sunken treasure, but Big Bad Barry tries to stop them.

episodes.name: Visiting the Marigolds
episodes.overview: Everyone visits King and Queen Marigold's castle, but chaos ensues.

episodes.name: The Party
episodes.overview: The twins cause chaos when they invite their friends to the castle for a birthday party.

episodes.name: Snow
episodes.overview: The youngsters help when Mr Elf forgets to deliver the last box of toys to Father Christmas.

episodes.name: The North Pole
episodes.overview: The elf plane is forced to make an emergency landing en route to delivering the last batch of Christmas presents.

episodes.name: Giants in the Meadow
episodes.overview: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger. How can they stop him without being discovered?

episodes.name: Mrs Fig's Magic School
episodes.overview: Holly goes to school for the first time, to learn something other than how to make magic jelly. Ben comes along, despite protests from the Wise Old Elf. Everybody learns a lesson.

episodes.name: Daisy & Poppy's Playgroup
episodes.overview: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, the twins have had no playgroup to attend. With no willing substitute available, Queen Thistle becomes their new teacher.

episodes.name: No Magic Day
episodes.overview: When the fairies wake up to find that their wands are not working, the kingdom has to cope without any help from magic for the entire day.

episodes.name: Spies
episodes.overview: When King and Queen Thistle ask Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf to build a boat capable of beating the Marigolds, the old rivals cannot help trying their best to outdo each other.

episodes.name: Hard Times
episodes.overview: The fairy kingdom is left without food because there is nothing left in the treasure chest to pay the elves. As money doesn't grow on trees, King Thistle has to find a job.

episodes.name: Gaston Goes To School
episodes.overview: Strawberry introduces her new pet to her classmates and everyone is impressed with how well trained she is. Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

episodes.name: Elf Rescue
episodes.overview: When Redbeard, who is giving Nanny Plum, Ben and Holly a ride on his 'unsinkable' boat, hits a rock, he calls on the services of Elf Rescue!

episodes.name: Lucy's School
episodes.overview: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, but they must avoid being spotted by the teacher, Miss Cookie. Will they make it to the end of the lesson?

episodes.name: Baby Dragon
episodes.overview: The children adopt a new pet - a dragon named Dave. They didn't know that he was going to grow and grow though... Wherever can they keep him?

episodes.name: Dolly Plum
episodes.overview: Daisy and Poppy turn Nanny Plum into a doll. Soon, the Wise Old Elf copies the fairy toy and it becomes so popular that everybody wants one.

episodes.name: The Lost City
episodes.overview: When Redbeard the Pirate goes in search of the Lost City, he soon gets in some bother and has to be rescued from the most unlikely spot.

episodes.name: The Shooting Star
episodes.overview: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a spaceship crash-lands in the Little Kingdom and can't make its way back home.

episodes.name: Nanny's Magic Test
episodes.overview: Nanny Plum's magic licence is out of date and she is forced to return to Mrs Fig's magic school and must pass a test set by the Wise Old Elf before she can get a new one.

episodes.name: Gaston To The Rescue
episodes.overview: After banning Gaston from the castle, the elves and fairies are out looking for him when they discover a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out. Who will save them?

episodes.name: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail
episodes.overview: Miss Cookie organizes a nature trail for Lucy [the little girl that Ben and Holly know] and her class, but unfortunately, it goes right through the Little Kingdom! So it's up to Ben and Holly to stop Lucy's class and her teacher finding out about the elves and fairies!

episodes.name: The New Wand
episodes.overview: Holly's wand catches a cold, and she gets a new replacement wand from the Wise Old Elf, called the WiseWand 3000 and she's thrilled - until she discovers it's special feature: it doesn't do ANY magic at all!

episodes.name: Superheroes
episodes.overview: In a homage to the 60's Batman series, Ben, Holly and their friends play a game where they become superheroes and supervillains. But Strawberry takes her supervillain role [The Strawberry Ice Queen] a little too far.

episodes.name: Mrs Witch's Spring Clean
episodes.overview: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch with a big spring clean by getting rid of some magical objects, but in the wrong hands they cause chaos in the Little Kingdom.

episodes.name: The Fruit Harvest
episodes.overview: Rosie, Ben and Holly help out on the day of the fruit harvest, but Mr Gnome has eaten all the fruit. The elves and fairies should find various ways to stop Mr Gnome from eating the blackberries.

episodes.name: Uncle Gaston
episodes.overview: Gaston's brother Tony and his family comes to visit, and Ben, Holly and Strawberry help him look after Tony's kids, Amber, Emerald and Keith.

episodes.name: Plumbing
episodes.overview: King Thistle decides on home improvement to impress King and Queen Marigold, but things don't quite go according to plan... The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. But with King and Queen Marigold coming round, there is not much time to fix it.

episodes.name: Big Ben & Holly
episodes.overview: When a spell goes wrong, Ben and Holly grow to human size! Now they are able to play with Lucy and her friends and want to stay big forever! But they soon discover that being big isn't all it's cracked up to be.

episodes.name: Daisy & Poppy Go Bananas
episodes.overview: Madness, mayhem, and devastation is caused in the Little Kingdom when Daisy and Poppy use King Thistle's mother's wand to learn how to do magic, escape the castle, and... go bananas!

episodes.name: Mr Elf takes a Holiday
episodes.overview: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences Mr Elf to take a holiday. Mr Elf isn't too pleased, but Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed at the news!. They go on holiday, but the plane breaks down and they crash-land on a deserted island. Meanwhile, Nanny Plum takes over the deliveries.

episodes.name: Honey Bees
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly visit the beehive to learn how honey is made. The Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and proceeds to show the children his own special way of collecting honey.

episodes.name: Lucy's Sleepover
episodes.overview: After Holly makes her small enough to play in the Little Kingdom, Lucy flies on Gaston the Ladybird and is invited to a sleepover at the Little Castle. But the next morning the spell wears off and she and Rex become big again.

episodes.name: Miss Jolly's Riding Club
episodes.overview: The children go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly. All goes well until the snails head straight toward the elf farm and Mr Elf's cabbages...

episodes.name: Springtime
episodes.overview: Spring is in the air in the Little Kingdom, which has daffodils, tulips, and 2 very hungry gnomes...

episodes.name: Pirate Treasure
episodes.overview: Ben, Holly, Captain Redbeard and Nanny Plum go on a treasure hunt with Captain Squid's treasure map, and the treasure is in the most oddest place: Lucy's school.

episodes.name: Gaston Goes to the Vet
episodes.overview: Ben goes on holiday with his parents, but the holiday is thrown off track when Gaston accidentally swallows the car keys!

episodes.name: Granny & Granpapa
episodes.overview: Everyone in the Little Kingdom and the Wise Old Elf is invited to a party at Granpapa and Granny Thistle's castle in the clouds.

episodes.name: The Dwarf Mine
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly discover holes popping up all over the Little Kingdom. They find out that the dwarves have woken up working in the mine, digging for treasure. So all the dwarves must be stopped.

episodes.name: Lucy's Elf & Fairy Party
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly and their friends are invited to Lucy's elf and fairy-themed birthday party. What do you think will happen next?

episodes.name: Planet Bong
episodes.overview: Zyros contacts Ben and Holly, and asks for the Wise Old Elf's help to save their plants.

episodes.name: Planet Bong Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly and their friends go to Zyros' home planet where they meet all manner of alien creatures and The Great Leader.

episodes.name: The Queen Bakes Cakes
episodes.overview: A cake sale is held to raise money to fix Mrs Fig's magic school after an apple crushes it. Unfortunately, Queen Thistle is baking, and nobody can eat her cakes.

episodes.name: The Witch Competition
episodes.overview: Mrs Witch must come out of retirement when a young witch called Wendy Witch wants to live in her house.

episodes.name: The Journey to the Centre of the Earth
episodes.overview: Naughty Daisy and Poppy cast a spell that sends their teacher Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, and Ben and Holly encounter dinosaurs and volcanos as Granpapa Thistle leads them on a mission to rescue her.

episodes.name: Redbeard's Rainbow
episodes.overview: Captain Redbeard is determined to find the treasure at the end of the rainbow.

episodes.name: Fox Cubs
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly go on a scout group called the Fox Cubs, but after criticizing Mr Elf's survival skills, Nanny Plum magics them all to the top of Mount Everest! And with no way to magic themselves off, how will they get home?

episodes.name: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf Swap Jobs for One Whole Day
episodes.overview: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf argue over who does the most work, so they decide to swap jobs for one whole day.

episodes.name: The Very Important Person
episodes.overview: A Very Important Person is coming to the Little Kingdom, and everyone is trying to get ready on time. But who is this Very Important Person? And will everything go to plan? I wouldn't bet on it!

episodes.name: Bunty II
episodes.overview: Mr Elf sails his new boat 'Bunty II', but Big Bad Barry has other ideas.

episodes.name: Fathers Day
episodes.overview: A Father's Day-themed episode of Ben and Holly.

episodes.name: Gaston's Birthday
episodes.overview: After Ben and Holly realises that Gaston has one new spot, it means that it is his birthday. But he is sad because he's never had a birthday party, so Ben and Holly prepare one for him.

episodes.name: The Mermaid
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly meet a mermaid, and with the help of Lucy and her dad, they return her lost magic mirror to her.

episodes.name: Daisy & Poppy Go to the Museum
episodes.overview: Daisy and Poppy cause untold havoc in a museum!

episodes.name: Chickens Ride West
episodes.overview: King Thistle wants eggs for breakfast, so the Elves, Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum decide to bring the chickens to the Little Castle.

episodes.name: Gaston is Lost
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly must find Gaston, who is lost.

episodes.name: Ben & Holly's Christmas
episodes.overview: Father Christmas pays a surprise visit to The Little Kingdom to check on the Christmas preparations. The Elves are busy making all of the toys and Nanny Plum is in control of the crackers. Everything is going according to plan until King Thistle gets trapped in a cracker, Queen Thistle gets trapped in a toy fairy castle and the Wise Old Elf gets trapped in a Christmas tree.

episodes.name: Ben & Holly's Christmas Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ben and Holly set out on a Christmas rescue mission to save the 3 trapped grown-ups from Part 1, but they all end up in Lucy's house for a Merry Christmas with Lucy and her family!
